Package org.sgrewritten.stargate.network.portal

Class NetworkedPortal

java.lang.Object
org.sgrewritten.stargate.network.portal.AbstractPortal
org.sgrewritten.stargate.network.portal.NetworkedPortal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Portal, RealPortal
public class NetworkedPortal extends AbstractPortal
A portal that is part of a network

For a networked portal, all portals in its network are its destinations

  • Field Summary

    • NetworkedPortal

      public NetworkedPortal(Network network, String name, Set<PortalFlag> flags, Set<Character> unrecognisedFlags, GateAPI gate, UUID ownerUUID, LanguageManager languageManager, StargateEconomyAPI economyAPI, String metaData) throws NameLengthException
      Instantiates a new networked portal
      Parameters:
      network -

      The network the portal belongs to

      name -

      The name of the portal

      flags -

      The flags enabled for the portal

      gate -

      The gate format used by this portal

      ownerUUID -

      The UUID of the portal's owner

      Throws:
      NameLengthException
